name: Centaur

grantsPowers.name: Hungry as a Horse
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Large Body Size Causes Faster Food Pool Decay

grantsPowers.name: Legion's Strength
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Increase Groups Attack Power and Support Power

grantsPowers.name: Sure Footed
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Prevents the Player from Being Dismounted via Damage

grantsPowers.name: Trailmaster
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Greatly Increase Movement Speed while Out of Combat

lore: Valkyn took the best of talents – language, wit, elegance, strength, agility – and he vested them in a single creature. He called this noble creature the Centaur and placed it above the lesser beasts, to use or rule as he might see fit.
